_header: Complain we may much is amiss
Subjects: evils of the time; contemporary conditions; prayers, to Christ
_description: On the wickedness of the world — sixteen cross-rhymed quatrains

BLAdd60577.First Lines:
Complayne we maye miche ys a misehelpe ys ny gon to haue
                    redresse…
BLAdd60577.Last Lines:
…our crokydnes þu canst make Ryghtglory to þe father
                    for euer Amen
BLAdd60577.Note:
Printed Tottel’s Miscellany, 2nd ed. 1557 (Rollins (1965)
XRollins,  Hyder E. 
             Tottel’s Miscellany (1557-1587).
         2nd ed. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1965, 1.232-4).
BLAdd60577.Attributed Title: totus mundus in maligno est positus (f. 57v)
